input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Manager

Location: Elwood, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description

The Warehouse Manager is responsible for directing and engaging employees and Warehouse Supervisors in CJ Logistics', Logistics Center to achieve productivity goals. The Warehouse Manager will manage Warehouse Supervisors and will spend most of the time coaching and leading the operations team to efficiently and safely achieve production and quality goals. The role will collaborate with various CJ Logistics teams on implementing initiatives and coordinating resources to implement solutions and training.

Salary range: $65,000 - $85,000

Position Responsibilities

Provide Leadership

Communicate clear expectationsMotivate and empower the teamDeliver on our promise to customers and employeesCollaborate with the Customer Operations and Operations Optimization leaders to drive efficiency and consistency

Manage Workforce Warehouse Supervisors

Train warehouse supervisors and hold them accountable for performanceEnsure team leaders are observing, training, and coaching operations employees to drive performanceConduct daily team meetingsMonitor operations on the floor and create a strong presence in the logistics centerProvide consistent messaging and communicationsConnect employees to CJ Logistics and the Customer business objectives

Deliver Exceptional Performance (including Safety, Quality, Productivity & Customer Requirements)

Implement and manage action plans to drive positive resultsManage staffing plansReview employee & shift performance with warehouse supervisorDrive cost-reduction initiatives and continuous-improvement activitySupport team leader efforts to improve operational performance

Oversee the Workplace Environment

Ensure the building is clean and safeAddress and manage product cases and damage responseTroubleshoot problems and remove obstacles so that warehouse supervisors can properly manage their shiftsEnsure systems are set up appropriately and enforce process complianceManage the environment to ensure throughput and system efficiency

Liaison with O2 and CO functions Job

Required

Job Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree or equal work history3-5 years of experience supervising employees and managing leadersSkills in leadership, organization, communication and cross functional teamworkUnderstanding of warehousing operations with experience in a distribution and/or manufacturing environmentEmphasis on safety is extremely important

Preferred

Familiarity with MHEFamiliarity with Microsoft Office applications including Excel and WordFamiliarity with warehouse management systems or Red Prairie WMS is a plusAbility shift priorities easily, and multi-task in a highly transactional environmentExcellent problem solving skillsAbility to engage with the workforce and leadership teams and create a positive environment and culture

CJ Logistics America About Statement:

CJ Logistics America delivers integrated and multimodal logistics services, connecting every corner of the world via air, sea and land. As a lead logistics partner (LLP), third-party logistics provider (3PL) and supply chain consultant, we help customers leverage supply chain management as a competitive advantage, reducing total system costs, transforming business processes, improving service and facilitating growth and change. With a focus on social responsibility and sustainability through growth with customers and communities, we prioritize the wellbeing of the end consumer, our customers and our employees. CJ Logistics America is responsible for the North America region, specializing in solutions for regulated industries such as food and beverage, consumer-packaged goods, healthcare and medical supplies, and tire and automotive.

CJ Logistics America is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We prohibit discrimination and or/harassment of any type, including but not limited to discrimination and or harassment based upon race, religion, religious creed, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, pregnancy or relation medical conditions, childbirth, breastfeeding, parental status, veteran and/or military statue, disability (physical or mental) medical condition, genetic information or characteristics, political affiliation, domestic violence survivor status, marital status, or other characteristics prohibited by federal, state, or local law. Additionally, CJ Logistics America participates in the E-Verify program in certain locations.

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
